title: Paris Saint-Germain FC - Wikipedia
snippet: Owned and funded by the club, it houses the men's football team, the women's football team, and the football academy, as well as the handball and judo teams and their academies. Campus PSG will feature a stadium that will complement the club's stadium, the Parc des Princes, which will be built ...

title: The stadium - PSG
snippet: Despite being new residents of the Ooredoo Centre, the women’s team will still play some of their games at the Paris Saint-Germain Campus. Located at the intersection of the A13 and A14 motorways, just 25 minutes from Paris, the Stadium will ...

title: Campus PSG - Wikipedia
snippet: The club hosted an official opening ceremony at Campus PSG in November 2024. The 59-hectare Campus PSG currently features 16 football pitches, the men's and women's football facilities, known as the professional building, and the academy facilities.
